00045 B3_ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(struct) b3BroadphaseProxy
00046 {
00047 
00048 B3_DECLARE_ALIGNED_ALLOCATOR();
00049         
00051         enum CollisionFilterGroups
00052         {
00053                 DefaultFilter = 1,
00054                 StaticFilter = 2,
00055                 KinematicFilter = 4,
00056                 DebrisFilter = 8,
00057                         SensorTrigger = 16,
00058                         CharacterFilter = 32,
00059                 AllFilter = -1 //all bits sets: DefaultFilter | StaticFilter | KinematicFilter | DebrisFilter | SensorTrigger
00060         };
00061 
00062         //Usually the client b3CollisionObject or Rigidbody class
00063         void*   m_clientObject;
00064         int m_collisionFilterGroup;
00065         int m_collisionFilterMask;
00066         int                     m_uniqueId;//m_uniqueId is introduced for paircache. could get rid of this, by calculating the address offset etc.
00067 
00068         b3Vector3       m_aabbMin;
00069         b3Vector3       m_aabbMax;
00070 
00071         B3_FORCE_INLINE int getUid() const
00072         {
00073                 return m_uniqueId;
00074         }
00075 
00076         //used for memory pools
00077         b3BroadphaseProxy() :m_clientObject(0)
00078         {
00079         }
00080 
00081         b3BroadphaseProxy(const b3Vector3& aabbMin,const b3Vector3& aabbMax,void* userPtr, int collisionFilterGroup,  int collisionFilterMask)
00082                 :m_clientObject(userPtr),
00083                 m_collisionFilterGroup(collisionFilterGroup),
00084                 m_collisionFilterMask(collisionFilterMask),
00085                 m_aabbMin(aabbMin),
00086                 m_aabbMax(aabbMax)
00087         {
00088         }
00089 };

00095 //
00096 // b3DbvtProxy
00097 //
00098 struct b3DbvtProxy : b3BroadphaseProxy
00099 {
00100         /* Fields               */ 
00101         //b3DbvtAabbMm  aabb;
00102         b3DbvtNode*             leaf;
00103         b3DbvtProxy*    links[2];
00104         int                             stage;
00105         /* ctor                 */ 
00106 
00107         explicit b3DbvtProxy() {}
00108         b3DbvtProxy(const b3Vector3& aabbMin,const b3Vector3& aabbMax,void* userPtr, int collisionFilterGroup,  int collisionFilterMask) :
00109         b3BroadphaseProxy(aabbMin,aabbMax,userPtr,collisionFilterGroup,collisionFilterMask)
00110         {
00111                 links[0]=links[1]=0;
00112         }
00113 };
00114 
00115 typedef b3AlignedObjectArray<b3DbvtProxy*>      b3DbvtProxyArray;

00120 struct  b3DynamicBvhBroadphase 
00121 {
00122         /* Config               */ 
00123         enum    {
00124                 DYNAMIC_SET                     =       0,      /* Dynamic set index    */ 
00125                 FIXED_SET                       =       1,      /* Fixed set index              */ 
00126                 STAGECOUNT                      =       2       /* Number of stages             */ 
00127         };
00128         /* Fields               */ 
00129         b3DynamicBvh                                    m_sets[2];                                      // Dbvt sets
00130         b3DbvtProxy*                    m_stageRoots[STAGECOUNT+1];     // Stages list
00131 
00132         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3DbvtProxy>       m_proxies;
00133         b3OverlappingPairCache* m_paircache;                            // Pair cache
00134         b3Scalar                                m_prediction;                           // Velocity prediction
00135         int                                             m_stageCurrent;                         // Current stage
00136         int                                             m_fupdates;                                     // % of fixed updates per frame
00137         int                                             m_dupdates;                                     // % of dynamic updates per frame
00138         int                                             m_cupdates;                                     // % of cleanup updates per frame
00139         int                                             m_newpairs;                                     // Number of pairs created
00140         int                                             m_fixedleft;                            // Fixed optimization left
00141         unsigned                                m_updates_call;                         // Number of updates call
00142         unsigned                                m_updates_done;                         // Number of updates done
00143         b3Scalar                                m_updates_ratio;                        // m_updates_done/m_updates_call
00144         int                                             m_pid;                                          // Parse id
00145         int                                             m_cid;                                          // Cleanup index
00146         bool                                    m_releasepaircache;                     // Release pair cache on delete
00147         bool                                    m_deferedcollide;                       // Defere dynamic/static collision to collide call
00148         bool                                    m_needcleanup;                          // Need to run cleanup?
00149 #if B3_DBVT_BP_PROFILE
00150         b3Clock                                 m_clock;
00151         struct  {
00152                 unsigned long           m_total;
00153                 unsigned long           m_ddcollide;
00154                 unsigned long           m_fdcollide;
00155                 unsigned long           m_cleanup;
00156                 unsigned long           m_jobcount;
00157         }                               m_profiling;
00158 #endif
00159         /* Methods              */ 
00160         b3DynamicBvhBroadphase(int proxyCapacity, b3OverlappingPairCache* paircache=0);
00161         virtual ~b3DynamicBvhBroadphase();
00162         void                                                    collide(b3Dispatcher* dispatcher);
00163         void                                                    optimize();
00164         
00165         /* b3BroadphaseInterface Implementation */
00166         b3BroadphaseProxy*                              createProxy(const b3Vector3& aabbMin,const b3Vector3& aabbMax,int objectIndex,void* userPtr, int collisionFilterGroup, int collisionFilterMask);
00167         virtual void                                    destroyProxy(b3BroadphaseProxy* proxy,b3Dispatcher* dispatcher);
00168         virtual void                                    setAabb(int objectId,const b3Vector3& aabbMin,const b3Vector3& aabbMax,b3Dispatcher* dispatcher);
00169         virtual void                                    rayTest(const b3Vector3& rayFrom,const b3Vector3& rayTo, b3BroadphaseRayCallback& rayCallback, const b3Vector3& aabbMin=b3MakeVector3(0,0,0), const b3Vector3& aabbMax = b3MakeVector3(0,0,0));
00170         virtual void                                    aabbTest(const b3Vector3& aabbMin, const b3Vector3& aabbMax, b3BroadphaseAabbCallback& callback);
00171 
00172         //virtual void                                  getAabb(b3BroadphaseProxy* proxy,b3Vector3& aabbMin, b3Vector3& aabbMax ) const;
00173         virtual void                                    getAabb(int objectId,b3Vector3& aabbMin, b3Vector3& aabbMax ) const;
00174         virtual void                                    calculateOverlappingPairs(b3Dispatcher* dispatcher=0);
00175         virtual b3OverlappingPairCache* getOverlappingPairCache();
00176         virtual const b3OverlappingPairCache*   getOverlappingPairCache() const;
00177         virtual void                                    getBroadphaseAabb(b3Vector3& aabbMin,b3Vector3& aabbMax) const;
00178         virtual void                                    printStats();
00179 
00180 
00182         virtual void resetPool(b3Dispatcher* dispatcher);
00183 
00184         void    performDeferredRemoval(b3Dispatcher* dispatcher);
00185         
00186         void    setVelocityPrediction(b3Scalar prediction)
00187         {
00188                 m_prediction = prediction;
00189         }
00190         b3Scalar getVelocityPrediction() const
00191         {
00192                 return m_prediction;
00193         }
